{# errorcheck #} {% import _ "foo" for A %} // ERROR `unexpected for at end of statement` {% import . "foo" for A %} // ERROR `unexpected for at end of statement` {% import boo "foo" for A %} // ERROR `unexpected for at end of statement` {% import "foo" A %} // ERROR `unexpected A at end of statement` {% import "foo" for A, %} // ERROR `unexpected %}, expecting name` {% import "foo" for a %} // ERROR `cannot enable access to unexported name a` {% import "foo" for _ %} // ERROR `cannot enable access to unexported name _`
